QuestData.Title: Loramus Thalipedes Awaits
QuestData.Description: The enchantment on these amulets was not complex. Together, their power will grant you access to Razelikh, the amulets' creator.$b$bI am prepared to perform the ritual on you and Loramus. Speak with me when you are both ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Bloodmage Lynnore and participate in her ritual.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Loramus Thalipedes in the Dreadmaul Furnace in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: It would seem that we are prepared to face our demon, $n. We have the amulet's blessing, we have the stone knife, and I alone know the demon's true name: Rakh'likh. Together, this may be enough to defeat the Defiler.
